name: part_004
file: tmp_【NO DOWN TIME!!】Mori Calliope 3D Birthday Live 2024 #NODOWNTIME2024 [sdzbH7LX80w]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope, Tokoyami Towa, and Takane Lui perform 'Bakushou' (爆笑) by Syudou.
Transition between songs with audience applause.
Mori Calliope and La+ Darknesss perform 'Clattanoia' (OxT).

subtitles.original: その顔じゃない...
subtitles.english: Not that face...

subtitles.original: I miss you.
subtitles.english: I miss you.

subtitles.original: ウハハハ　仰せのまま
subtitles.english: Uhahaha, as you wish

subtitles.original: 惨めな奴らに唾吐いた
subtitles.english: Spitting on those miserable wretches

subtitles.original: ガハハハ　彼と一緒に
subtitles.english: Gahahaha, together with him

subtitles.original: 哀れみ込めた愛の賛歌
subtitles.english: A hymn of love filled with pity

subtitles.original: 気にならない　気づきもしない
subtitles.english: I don't care, I don't even notice

subtitles.original: 笑ってしまうぜ不完全体
subtitles.english: I can't help but laugh, you incomplete thing

subtitles.original: この意味が分かるまではただ
subtitles.english: Until you understand the meaning of this, just...

subtitles.original: 静かに笑ってんだ
subtitles.english: ...keep laughing quietly.

subtitles.original: これを止めろだ　そこ代わって死ねだ
subtitles.english: Stop this, or swap places and die

subtitles.original: いつのお野菜も残しちゃって
subtitles.english: Always leaving your vegetables behind

subtitles.original: 俺の全部を喰らいな　心して
subtitles.english: Eat everything of mine, prepare yourself

subtitles.original: けど一番右のさ、お前が同じ
subtitles.english: But the one on the far right... you're the same

subtitles.original: Oh baby ただ笑って
subtitles.english: Oh baby, just laugh

subtitles.original: 独り震えて歌歌って
subtitles.english: Singing while trembling alone

subtitles.original: 俺をそいつが飼い慣らす
subtitles.english: That thing will tame me

subtitles.original: お前も、アンデッドも
subtitles.english: You, and the undead too

subtitles.original: ウハハハ　晴れ行く情緒
subtitles.english: Uhahaha, emotions clearing up

subtitles.original: 西の魔女くるリスペクト
subtitles.english: Respecting the witch of the west

subtitles.original: ガハハハ　ガチで自称
subtitles.english: Gahahaha, seriously self-proclaimed

subtitles.original: 最下位果ての心酔者
subtitles.english: An adorer at the bottom of the pile

subtitles.original: 空文じゃない　話したくない
subtitles.english: It's not empty words, I don't want to talk

subtitles.original: 狂っても大概に三年後
subtitles.english: Even if I go crazy, keep it within reason, three years later

subtitles.original: 邪論などかき消すほどほら
subtitles.english: Look, enough to drown out all those wrong views

subtitles.original: 誰もが笑ってんだ
subtitles.english: Everyone is laughing.

subtitles.original: あなたが見てきた光たちは
subtitles.english: The lights you have seen

subtitles.original: 今もまだここを強く握って
subtitles.english: Are still gripping this place tightly

subtitles.original: 苦しませる
subtitles.english: Causing pain

subtitles.original: 「笑われる」「笑わせる」の溝
subtitles.english: The gap between being laughed at and making others laugh

subtitles.original: ほとばしって聞かせてやるから
subtitles.english: It overflows, so I'll let you hear it

subtitles.original: この名前くらいは覚えて帰れ
subtitles.english: At least remember this name before you go home!

subtitles.original: ウハハハ　仰せのまま
subtitles.english: Uhahaha, as you wish

subtitles.original: 惨めな奴らに唾吐いた
subtitles.english: Spitting on those miserable wretches

subtitles.original: ガハハハ　彼と一緒に
subtitles.english: Gahahaha, together with him

subtitles.original: 哀れみ込めた愛の賛歌
subtitles.english: A hymn of love filled with pity

subtitles.original: ウハハハ　辞めて頂戴
subtitles.english: Uhahaha, please stop

subtitles.original: 極一丁はまだつまらんさ
subtitles.english: One song is still boring

subtitles.original: ガハハハ　芸で上等
subtitles.english: Gahahaha, superior with my craft

subtitles.original: これが答えだ文句あるか
subtitles.english: This is the answer, any complaints?

subtitles.original: 成果試験　乗るか剃るか
subtitles.english: Achievement test, win or lose

subtitles.original: 出世人生商売繁盛
subtitles.english: Successful life, business prosperity

subtitles.original: 振り向けず登り続けただ
subtitles.english: Just keep climbing without looking back

subtitles.original: 天上天下独りだって出囃子は鳴ってんだ
subtitles.english: Even if I'm all alone in this world, my theme song is playing!

subtitles.original: 答えはどこへ
subtitles.english: Where is the answer?

subtitles.original: 探して
subtitles.english: Looking for it

subtitles.original: Where's my soul?
subtitles.english: Where's my soul?

subtitles.original: It's like a fear　悪い夢の様で
subtitles.english: It's like a fear, just like a bad dream

subtitles.original: 目覚めても all I've got is bones
subtitles.english: Even when I wake, all I've got is bones

subtitles.original: I'm in a panic? Get out, hurry
subtitles.english: I'm in a panic? Get out, hurry

subtitles.original: Oh, there are mysteries and miseries
subtitles.english: Oh, there are mysteries and miseries

subtitles.original: Dead or alive　狭間に揺られて
subtitles.english: Dead or alive, swayed in the gap

subtitles.original: 彷徨えば right to the hell
subtitles.english: If I wander, it's right to the hell

subtitles.original: 孤独の招待　獲物の正体
subtitles.english: Invitation to solitude, the identity of the prey

subtitles.original: 踊る 1, 2, 3 steps on this dark stage
subtitles.english: Dancing 1, 2, 3 steps on this dark stage

subtitles.original: Raise your flag, march on, fight　仮面の淵へ
subtitles.english: Raise your flag, march on, fight, to the edge of the mask

subtitles.original: 手を掛けたなら骨が鳴るのみ
subtitles.english: If you reach out, only the bones will rattle

subtitles.original: Wars and swords, tears and blood　溢る力が
subtitles.english: Wars and swords, tears and blood, the overflowing power...

subtitles.original: 不意に笑い出した
subtitles.english: ...suddenly started laughing.

subtitles.original: 答えはどこへ
subtitles.english: Where is the answer?

subtitles.original: 探して
subtitles.english: Looking for it

subtitles.original: Where's my soul? Where's my heart?
subtitles.english: Where's my soul? Where's my heart?

subtitles.original: 現実（いま）に呑まれてく
subtitles.english: Being swallowed by reality

subtitles.original: Don't hesitate, go this way
subtitles.english: Don't hesitate, go this way

subtitles.original: Don't stay
subtitles.english: Don't stay

subtitles.original: 理解らない　構わない
subtitles.english: I don't understand, I don't care

subtitles.original: 紛い物振るっても
subtitles.english: Even if I brandish a fake

subtitles.original: ただこの世界を生き抜けよ
subtitles.english: Just survive in this world

subtitles.original: 無くした哀しみがまた疼いて
subtitles.english: The lost sadness aches again

subtitles.original: Misery-World
subtitles.english: Misery-World

subtitles.original: 漆黒の空　冷たく midnight / 夜の闇は always drives me mad
subtitles.english: Pitch black sky, cold midnight / The darkness of night always drives me mad

subtitles.original: Where is the star now? I found the star now / But it's so beautiful, I'm so doubtful
subtitles.english: Where is the star now? I found the star now / But it's so beautiful, I'm so doubtful

subtitles.original: 戸惑いの中宿る desire
subtitles.english: Desire dwelling amidst confusion

subtitles.original: 見渡せば sky, and land and sea
subtitles.english: Looking around, sky and land and sea

subtitles.original: ハイエの嗤い　他愛ない支配
subtitles.english: The hyena's sneer, a trivial dominion

subtitles.original: 登る 1, 2, 3 steps to the royal throne
subtitles.english: Climbing 1, 2, 3 steps to the royal throne

subtitles.original: Cast a spell, call them up　絶望を呼べ
subtitles.english: Cast a spell, call them up, summon the despair

subtitles.original: 虚しさに酔い　兵たちが舞う
subtitles.english: Intoxicated by emptiness, the soldiers dance

subtitles.original: Shouts and barks, grief and death　戦慄く者に
subtitles.english: Shouts and barks, grief and death, to those who tremble...

subtitles.original: 無慈悲を振り下ろせ
subtitles.english: ...bring down your ruthlessness!

subtitles.original: 無情を行け
subtitles.english: Go through the heartlessness

subtitles.original: 暴いて
subtitles.english: Uncover it

subtitles.original: Break it all!
subtitles.english: Break it all!
